title: Suzuki Motorcycle sells 71,526 units in May
description: "The two-wheeler industry continues to maneuver through the challenges presented by the pandemic and supply-chain crisis. Despite these testing circumstances, the company has witnessed a satisfactory demand, both from the domestic and overseas markets," Suzuki Motorcycle India MD Satoshi Uchida said in a statement.
